trigger.send:
local xpCurrent = %2 local xpOld = tonumber(GetVariable("xpOld")) local xpDiff = xpCurrent - xpOld local xpHourRoutine = tonumber(GetVariable("xpHourRoutine")) local xpAccum = tonumber(GetVariable("xpAccum")) local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world
if xpDiff ~= 0 then if xpOld == -1 then Note ('initializing xp') else Note ('You have gained xp: ' .. xpDiff) SetStatus ("You have gained xp: ", xpDiff) end
if xpHourRoutine ~= 0 then xpAccum = xpAccum + xpDiff Note ('Accumulated XP: ' .. xpAccum) SetVariable("xpAccum", xpAccum)
t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('You have gained xp: ' .. xpDiff) t:Note ('Accumulated XP: ' .. xpAccum) end
SetVariable("xpOld", xpCurrent) end

local xpCurrent = %3 local xpOld = tonumber(GetVariable("xpOld")) local xpDiff = xpCurrent - xpOld
if xpDiff ~= 0 then if xpOld == -1 then Note ('initializing xp') else Note ('You have gained xp: ' .. xpDiff) SetStatus ("You have gained xp: ", xpDiff) end
SetVariable("xpOld", xpCurrent) end

alias.send:
local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world local xpAccum = tonumber(GetVariable("xpAccum"))
SetVariable ("xpHourRoutine", 1) SetVariable ("xpAccum", 0) EnableTimer ("xpHour_Timer", true) Note ('xpHour Timer on')
xpHourOpened = world.Open ("worlds\\\\xpHour.MCL") if xpHourOpened == true then Note ("XP Tracking Window On")
t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('Timer Started') t:Note ('Accumulated XP: ' .. xpAccum) else Note ("XP Tracking Window Did Not Load") end
openedSWmudOk = world.Open ("worlds\\\\SWmud.MCL") -- puts focus back on main window

local t = GetWorld ("xpHour") -- get "xpHour" world local xpAccum = tonumber(GetVariable("xpAccum"))
SetVariable ("xpHourRoutine", 0) EnableTimer ("xpHour_Timer", false) Note ('xpHour Timer off')
t:DeleteOutput() t:Note ('Timer Aborted') t:Note ('Accumulated XP: ' .. xpAccum)
